title: PigiBank
description:
PigiBank – a revolutionary app designed to teach children basic financial literacy in a fun, engaging, and intuitive way. PigiBank simulates a bank account experience where kids learn about fixed incomes, expenses, and even interest on loans through a simplified, kid-friendly interface.
Key Features Include:
• Multi-language support (English & Hebrew)
 • Parent Dashboard with a complete financial overview
 • Kid account management (create, edit, delete)
 • Recurring allowance payments with various frequencies
 • Detailed transaction history and tracking
 • Holiday bonuses for special occasions
 • Savings goals to monitor progress
 • A smart loan system with interest and repayment tracking
 • Dedicated Kid Dashboard for personal financial management
 • Ability to adjust funds (add or subtract money)
 • Automated birthday and holiday gift functionalities
This app is completely free and was developed using AI under my guidance. As we’re still in the early stages, your feedback is invaluable in helping us refine and improve the experience.
creator: Omri ben ami

title: TechInterviewGenerator
description:
Have you ever composed a complete technical interview, only to discover that all the questions and answers were available on Glassdoor just a few weeks later?

Have you ever thought a candidate solved your "hard" question too easily, only to later realize they had help from a previous candidate who told them what to look up online?

Or what about candidates who successfully answered all your LeetCode-style questions, got hired, and only then did you realize that while they might have practiced school problems, they don’t actually know how to handle real-world work as well as you expected?

This tool is here to help - generating questions based on your own real-world code or AI-generated code, each with an explanation of why it's valuable to ask and what should be considered a good answer.
creator: Zohar Peled

title: Pcaller - Private Call Dialer
description:
Want to call anonymously and keep your number hidden? Look no further! Pcaller is here to help you hide your caller id effortlessly. With our powerful, user-friendly app, you can now make anonymous calls without exposing your number. Say goodbye to worrying about how to block your number and hello to complete privacy with every call.

Key Features:

Private Calling Made Easy: Pcaller empowers you to effortlessly dial as a private caller, shielding your number from prying eyes. Choose between default options like #31# or customize your own prefix for added flexibility. Now you can easily learn how to call anonymously and maintain your privacy with no hassle.

Quick Dialing: With Pcaller, you can swiftly make calls either by manually dialing the number or conveniently selecting contacts from your address book. The choice is yours—call openly or anonymously. No more stress about how to block caller id—Pcaller takes care of that for you.

Total Number Control: Change your prefix on-the-fly to seamlessly hide your number whenever you want. Take charge of your privacy like never before. You'll never need to worry about how to do no caller id again.

Call History Management: Pcaller doesn't just stop at private calls—it also manages your call history. You decide which calls get saved within the app, giving you complete control over your communication records. Forget about manual adjustments, how to hide caller id—Pcaller automates everything.

Streamlined Experience: Tired of navigating phone settings each time you need to make a private call? Pcaller eliminates that hassle. No more copying and pasting numbers with prefixes—our app handles it for you, making it effortless to block private calls.

Efficiency at its Best: Dialing as a private number has never been this efficient. Pcaller ensures that your privacy is just a tap away, saving you time and effort. You'll never need to worry about block my number again.

Get ready to dial as a private number effortlessly with Pcaller - your best app for private calling. Download Pcaller now and take control of your privacy with just a tap.

The app allows anonymous calls with a hidden prefix before dialing. Various mobile providers have different prefixes. Check with your cellular carrier for the private dialing prefix. Additional charges may apply, confirm with your carrier.
creator: oran

title: Surfify - Web Browser on Watch
description:
Browse from your wrist with Surfify – the ultimate smartwatch browser!

Surfify is the ultimate app for web browsing on your smartwatch.

With Surfify, you can sync your bookmarks from your phone app to your watch, and access your favorite sites with a tap of your wrist.

No need to pull out your phone from your pocket or bag, when you can surf the web on your watch.

- Organize bookmarks seamlessly - Add, delete, and edit bookmarks with direct URLs to your preferred web pages.

- Instant sync between Phone and your Watch - Immediate access to bookmarks on both devices, anywhere, anytime.

- Smart browsing on your wrist - Browse the web without needing to pick up your phone, with a user-friendly interface optimized for the watch's small screen.

- Smooth user experience - Clean design for easy navigation within the app.

Transform your smartwatch with our user-friendly browser for seamless web access and fast browsing, featuring quick links, bookmark sync, and smart navigation.

Transform your smartwatch into a powerful browsing tool with Surfify. Download now and dive into a world of effortless web surfing right from your wrist!

title: iCliper - Clipboard Manager
description:
iCliper is a Clipboard Manager designed to elevate your clipboard experience. This Clipboard app saves and organizes everything you copy, ensuring you have quick and easy access to your copied content. Whether you're copying text, images, or other items, iCliper simplifies managing your Clipboard history and enhances your workflow. Access your copied content easily and intuitively, everywhere — in messages, emails, notes, or any other app.

Main Features:

Clipboard History Management: iCliper captures and saves everything you copy to the clipboard, ensuring your copied content is always accessible. No more worrying about losing important information. It's an ideal solution for those who need to keep track of multiple items effortlessly.

Text Clipboard: Store and access copied text instantly with iCliper’s simple and efficient Text clipboard feature. Your clipboard history is neatly organized and ready for quick retrieval. A perfect Clipboard organizer for managing your copied content.

Copy and Paste Tool: Effortlessly paste your copied content with the Quick Paste feature, making your daily tasks more efficient.

Clipboard Saver: iCliper saves all your copied items, ensuring they’re available whenever you need them. Never lose your important copy paste history again.

Navigate and interact with your clipboard history effortlessly through iCliper’s intuitive and user-friendly interface, designed to enhance your overall experience. It makes this app for clipboard a powerful tool for organizing and retrieving your clipboard content.

Take full control of your clipboard with iCliper Pasteboard manager. It helps you save, organize, and manage your copy-paste history in a way that's easy to navigate.

With iCliper, managing clipboard content has never been simpler. Whether you're organizing and retrieving copied content or using the app for efficient workflow management, iCliper helps you save time and boost productivity. It's designed for easy use, making it the perfect solution for those who need quick access to their clipboard across all apps.

Download iCliper today and take control of your clipboard. Unlock your full productivity potential with the power of iCliper.
creator: oran
